headline: Global Payments Inc. (GPN): Among the Worst Performing Stocks in S&P 500 So Far in 2025
summary: We recently published a list of the 11 Worst Performing Stocks in S&P 500 So Far in 2025. In this article, we will take a look at where Global Payments Inc. (NYSE:GPN) stands against other worst performing stocks this year. After a two-year surge of 53%, marking the best performance for the broad market index […]
